item.description:
Join in the fun at the biggest Bollywood live band concert on the East Coast with DIN CHECK! The live band will play numbers from all eras - the show is named "5 DECADES OF BOLLYWOOD" and is held at spectacular PARK THEATER....expecting 700+ desis from all over MA, RI, NH, and CT to join in this spectacular event.
Click on http://tickets.ricpa.net/eventperformances.asp?evt=94 for tickets. $10/adult. Children under 12 free. Free parking. Food available for purchase.
Visit www.dincheck.com for more info on the band.
item.name: BOLLYWOOD LIVE BAND CONCERT - DIN CHECK!!
